QuestData.Title: Imperator's Rise: Imperator Mar'gok
QuestData.Description: I never thought much of them ogres, not until I saw a Highmaul legion on the march. Like a wall o' armored muscle, backed by the magics o' the emperor's best sorcerers. Never underestimate an ogre.$b$bImperator Mar'gok is the grand Imperator of Highmaul. Aye, he's a cunning one - allied himself with the Iron Horde, he did. If we're to break up the party, we'd best start at the top.$b$bTravel to Highmaul and defeat Imperator Mar'gok!
